long_description: The hub of the TraiLogic Collection, the women's Kelty PK 50 has a compartmentalized design to easily organize and access your gear while evenly distributing weight. 15-liter front pocket detaches so you can bring it into your tent or leave it behind if you want to pack fast and light. Roll-top closures enhance compression and cut weight so that you can take a load off your back and your mind. Enjoy easy access and organization with a spacious main compartment, dedicated compartments for clothing and sleeping bag, top pocket and wing pockets. Detachable 15-liter front pocket can be removed and left behind, offering the freedom and flexibility of using the PK as a 50-liter or 35-liter pack. Top-loading main compartment and sleeping bag compartment feature roll-top closures that enhance compression and trim weight. Convenient, easy-access top and wing pockets offer on-trail access to essentials. Side wings with integrated pockets offer full-pack compression to stabilize your load for a more efficient carry. Sized for a woman's frame, the air-mesh shoulder straps, hipbelt and lumbar support and a ventilating back panel help ensure cool comfort all day long. Single aluminum stay and framesheet provide support and shift weight to your hips; sternum strap, belt stabilizers and load stabilizer straps let you fine-tune the harness. Stretch-mesh hipbelt pockets, water-bottle pockets and front pocket keep often-used gear at your fingertips. Hydration compatible (reservoir sold separately). Designed to pack together with the Kelty TraiLogic Tent and footprint (sold separately). The Kelty TraiLogic PK W50 Pack also features an ice axe loop, key fob and integrated pull-out raincover.
short_description: The hub of the TraiLogic Collection, the women's Kelty PK 50 has a compartmentalized design to easily organize and access your gear while evenly distributing weight.
